item.title: Eric Adams ends reelection bid, reshaping New York mayoral race

item.title: Sen. Fetterman, at odds with fellow Democrats, says he won't switch parties
item.description: Sen. John Fetterman has no intention of leaving the Democratic Party -- despite growing tensions with its left wing.

item.title: Republicans and Democrats play the blame game ahead of a potential government shutdown
item.description: Congressional leaders are pointing fingers at each other ahead of a high-stakes meeting at the White House to avert a potential government shutdown.
